text: Bad Boys is a 1983 American crime drama movie directed by Rick Rosenthal and stars Sean Penn, Esai Morales, Clancy Brown, Alan Ruck and Ally Sheedy. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1983 crime drama movies Category:1980s prison movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Rick Rosenthal Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in Illinois
title: Bad Boys (1983 movie)
